suppress.notes: We do not use: Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE + Spring Security (any version), see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258 False positive confirmed.

These CVE's are coming from Dhowden tag library and it impacts only MP3/MP4/OGG/FLAC metadata parsing library. Also it is declared as false positive in https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/3043
An issue was discovered in netplex json-smart-v1 through 2015-10-23 and json-smart-v2 through 2.4.
